img_summary: The image depicts a green bead bracelet, likely representing an in-game item from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the context, it is part of a guide detailing rare items and their effects. The surrounding text lists other items like the "Wind Chime," "Agate Jar," and "Back Scratcher," suggesting this bracelet may also provide a unique gameplay benefit or enhancement.
